name: pulsarr
tagline: A browser based helper for managing media automation tools
description: Pulsarr is a self-hosted browser extension and web UI that integrates with Radarr, Sonarr, and similar tools to streamline adding and managing media releases across your setup.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Add media to Radarr and Sonarr directly from IMDb, TMDB, and other websites

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Manage media additions and monitor *arr applications from a unified interface

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search for media across multiple sources and add to your library instantly

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Choose quality profiles and root folders when adding new media

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts when media is added, downloaded, or encounters issues

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Automatically import and add media from IMDb or Trakt watchlists
